code: import{loadUsers}from"./loadUsers";export var editUser=function editUser(_ref){var id=_ref.id,name=_ref.name,phone=_ref.phone,email=_ref.email,idAccess=_ref.idAccess;return function(dispatch){var options={method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json;charset=utf-8"},body:JSON.stringify({id:id,name:name,phone:phone,email:email,idAccess:idAccess})};fetch("https://wsuno.xyz/api/editUser",options).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){if(!data.OK){throw Error('Ошибка запроса на сервер');}dispatch(loadUsers({userId:localStorage.userId/1}));}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};
